body: I was trying to make an imgur album with pictures of my map. But when im supposed to choose the pictures, i can't/dont know how to.
body_tagged: I was trying to make an imgur album with pictures of my map. But when im supposed to choose the pictures, i can't/dont know how to.
title: How do i add pictures on my new imgur album?

replies.body: Upload images, then browse computer, then choose all images you want to upload, then start uploading.  Don't forget to name your album.
replies.body_tagged: Upload images, then browse computer, then choose all images you want to upload, then start uploading.  Don't forget to name your album.
